Key Arguments: The legislation resembles authoritarian control similar to that of communist China.
It would make the government the sole arbiter of truth, suppressing differing opinions.
Free speech is essential for democracy and should not be stifled.
Historical figures have warned against the suppression of free speech as a threat to liberty.
Notable Quotes: This legislation is a piece of legislation worthy of communist China.
No truly democratic country stifles free speech. Democracy demands it.
Whoever would overthrow the liberty of a nation must begin by subduing the acts of free speech.
